bibl.title: Select Papyri
bibl.note: P. Sel. Warga 1-13. Diss. Univ. of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. - 1. P. Mich. Inv. 3390. Homer, Odyssey 4, 355-389. 1st half of II A.D. - 2-3. P. Cairo Thead. Inv. 70-71 [= P. Cair. Inv. SR 3049 (70-71)]. Two copies of a census return. Theadelphia, 161 A.D. - 4. P. Cairo Thead. Inv. 72 [= P. Cair. Inv. SR 3049 (72)]. Census return. Theadelphia, 161 A.D. - 5. P. Mich. Inv. 780. Loan repayment. Theadelphia, 133 A.D. - 6. P. Mich. Inv. 385. Sale and cession of land. Prov. unknown. - 7. P. Tebt. II, 529 descr. Ca. 111-112 A.D. - 8. P. Mich. Inv. 151. Wet-nurse contract. Prov. unknown, 154 A.D. - 9. P. Fay. 358 descr. Poll-tax receipt. Hiera Pule, 160 A.D. - 10. P. Mich. Inv. 3366. List of payments. Prov. unknown, II A.D. - 11. P. Oxy. III, 586 descr. Receipt for "opsonion", 112 A.D. - 12. P. Mich. Inv. 985. Private letter. Prov. unknown, II A.D. - 13. P. Berkeley Tebt. Inv. UC 2444 [= Inv. 21400-21401]. Conclusion of a letter. 6 A.D.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Berkeley Tebt. Inv. 21400; 21401 P. Cair. Inv. SR 3049 (70); (71); (72) P. Fay. 358 descr. P. Mich. Inv. 151; 385; 780; 985; 3366; 3390 P. Oxy. III, 586 descr. P. Sel. Warga P. Tebt. II, 529 descr.
